Title: MVVM Tools
Description: The MMVM tools provides you some comfortable tools to help you to write your UI application simply and fast.
HomeWiki:
MVVM Tools
The MMVM tools provides you some comfortable tools to help you to write your UI application simply and fast.

It is assumed that the library have to work on following platforms Microsoft:
  • .Net Framework 4 and higher
  • Silverlight 4 and higher
  • Windows Phone 8 and higher
  • .Net for Windows Store apps

NuGet pakage
